Parameters.Name: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS AND VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY VALIDATION

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Correct response: only mandatoty fields in GetOSDOptions

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Correct response: all OSD options are returned in GetOSDOptions (TextString.Type = Plane, Color in ColorList format)
Test.Description: GetOSDOptions: TextString.Type = Plane - the 1st Color element is ColorList

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Correct response: all OSD options are returned in GetOSDOptions (TextString.Type = Plane, Color in ColorspaceRange format)
Test.Description: GetOSDOptions: TextString.Type = Plane - the 1st Color element is ColorList

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Correct response: OSD.Position.Type = Custom
Test.Description: GetOSDOptions: OSD.Position.Type = Custom Check that Position.Pos element is present in CreateOSD request

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: GetOSDs: empty initial list

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: CreateOSDResponse: token differs from request token

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: DUT creates OSD with token differs from token from request Check that DTT will use token from response

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: No Type field in GetOSDOptions
Test.Description: Onvif client checks if DUT supports OSD configurations of the type=text. Otherwise skip all steps and pass the test.

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: No TextOption fields in GetOSDOptions
Test.Description: Onvif client checks if DUT supports OSD configurations of the type=text. Otherwise skip all steps and pass the test.

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Two VideoSourceConfigurations

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Two VideoSourceConfigurations - The 1st reached max of PlainText

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: There is 1st CreateOSD type Date, 2nd CreateOSD type Time

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: 1st and 2nd CreateOSD type = Date

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: In 1st CreateOSD type Time, in 2nd CreateOSD DateAndTime type

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: Both CreateOSD with DateAndTime type

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: There is a lot of odd fields after first CreateOSD
Test.Description: 1st CreateOSD type Date, 2nd CreateOSD type Time

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: #1581: One VSC does not support OSD (MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0)
Test.Description: Ticket #1581: if DUT sends MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0 in OSD options, the Client shall assue that this VSC does not support OSD

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: DUT supports only custom OSD text types

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: Options contains only MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total, max exceeded

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: MaximumNumberOfOSDs in Options: Total=1, PlainText=1; amount of OSDs: 1 text
Test.Description: DTT shall delete existing OSD before create

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: MaximumNumberOfOSDs in Options: Total=2, PlainText=1; amount of OSDs: 1 text
Test.Description: DTT shall delete existing OSD before create

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: MaximumNumberOfOSDs in Options: Total=2, PlainText=1, Image=1; amount of OSDs: 1 image
Test.Description: DTT shall no delete existing OSD before create

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: MaximumNumberOfOSDs in Options: Total=2, PlainText=2, Date=1, Time=1; amount of OSDs: 1 Date text; OSD to create: Date, Time
Test.Description: DTT shall delete existing OSD before create

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR TEXT OVERLAY
Test.Name: A.30: 3 text OSDs and 1 image OSD exist
Test.Description: All text OSDs shall be deleted Image OSD shall not be deleted
